snippet: The former National Security Agency contractor Edward J. Snowden, who had requested asylum from Brazil months ago, made the offer in a letter published in a Brazilian newspaper.
abstract: Edward J Snowden says in open letter published in Brazilian paper Folha de Sao Paulo that he is prepared to assist Brazilian investigations into American spying there, but that he will be unable to do so until granted permanent political asylum.
lead_paragraph: The former National Security Agency contractor Edward J. Snowden, who had requested asylum from Brazil months ago, made the offer in a letter published in a Brazilian newspaper.

headline.main: Snowden Offers Help to Brazil in Spy Case
headline.print_headline: Snowden Offers Help to Brazil in Spy Case
